props.name: help
props.description: Optional help text below the field

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID. The component `_uid` will be used as default.

props.name: label
props.description: A descriptive label for the field

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: reports
props.description: List of stat reports. See `k-stat` for all options of each report.

props.name: size
props.description: Text size of the stat's value
